newsitem.title: USA: Newmont says unwound 1.1 mln oz gold hedge.
newsitem.headline: Newmont says unwound 1.1 mln oz gold hedge.

text.p: Newmont Gold Company said it has purchased about 1.1 million ounces of gold to offset the hedge position it acquired in the merger with Santa Fe Pacific Gold Corp.
Newmont will realize a gain of about $100 million on the transaction.
